A game that truly grasps the idea of helping those in dire need to escape their reality.
After allowing peru to play on our servers, and bought accounts in 4-6k. This game has truly made a better place to find friends of South America, and help people fully understand the hardships and struggles these people go through by having feeding South Americans only play Pos 1-2 or jungle. It opened up a world of hard working, can collecting children to gather change and be fortunate enough to play at their internet cafe's and flood US West/East. God Bless them.

Very thankful for the open-mindedness of Valve and their appreciation of "Peru Lives Matter."

<3

Jogo lixo, sistema de ranked ruim e injusto, Colocam Rank de mmr solo pra jogar com mais 4 lepras, o correto seria Solo ser x1 no meio e grupo ser batalha entre times! Deveriam analisar isso que com certeza todos jogadores vão apoiar! Jogo não presta pra quem deseja relaxar e se divertir, é uma porcaria, Valve por favor mude o sistema de partidas rankeadas, senão irão perder mais e mais jogadores para lixos como LoL e Smite!

Dota 2 Review - Raymond KT

The environment is extremely pastel and just looks gross.. The shop interface is a nightmare without any form of order. The abysmal attack animations make last hitting much more difficult than it needs to be. The game menu itself is the opposite of intuitive, difficult to navigate, and feels very dated. I’ve been seeing more and more reviews from long time die hard players that complain the game is changing and headed in a bad direction. So, just another good reason why to not play Dota 2. I don’t hate the game but can’t say I like it very much either.
Отличная игра,не смотря на то что я застрял на 2к помойке

Ich empfehle Dota 2, jedem der ein Fan von  MOBA und Strategie Spielen ist. In Dota 2 lernt man nie aus. Kein Match ist wie das andere. Mit über 100 verschiedenen Helden mit den unterschiedlichsten Fähigkeiten entsteht jedes mal ein Atemberaubendes Gefecht. Es ist nie zu spät mit Dota 2 anzufangen. Dota 2 entwickelt sich stätig fort und deswegen lernt man nie aus. Regelmäßige Updates und eine mehrfach Millionen große Community sorgt für reichlich Abwechslung und harte Kämpfe. Ich habe knappe 500 Stunden in dieses Spiel investiert und doch stehe ich noch ganz am Anfang meiner Reise. Wer Zeit mitbringt, der ist bei Dota 2 genau richtig :) 

Dota 2 hat sich zu einem meiner Lieblings Spiele entwickelt und deshalb Empfehle ich es weiter :)

I like this game play, strategy and critical thinking is needed to win, maybe also skill and remember your enemy weakness.
But since this game is quite serious, like mmr, event, tournament, etc; some retard easily angry and blaming everywhere. Most common blame is "putang ina mo" "noob" and "bobo". Thats annoying as hell since mostly blamer not really good in play. Also this game has unpredictable update that annoying too, i mean some online game scheduled their update in certain time, but dota is not. So, prepare yourself for many quota anytime.

You need to change the requirements for low prio..literally I can end in low priority status just by owning the enemy team. Bring it back to the old way, By quitting, you get punished with lp. But not by reports.

Moba ben fatto, meriterebbe che più gente ci giocasse.
Ha anche lui qualche pecca però:
1) Non è completamente tradotto in italiano;
2) È nettamente più pesante, graficamente parlando, rispetto al suo diretto competitore (sapete di che gioco parlo).
3) Le impostazioni sono molte ed alle volte cambiare qualcosa può essere più difficile di quel che dovrebbe essere.
